title: sparse tensor creation should raise IndexError if indices are out of bounds
body_html:
I think the following statement should raise an IndexError, indicating index 2 for axis 0 is out of bounds:

torch.sparse.FloatTensor(torch.LongTensor([[1, 2],[0, 2]]), torch.FloatTensor([.5,.5]), torch.Size([2,3])).to_dense()

At the moment it just creates the tensor in the requested size, ignoring the elements that are beyond the limits. This could introduce some bugs, that are hard to track down.
